title: Did 18 immigrant children die on the border patrol during Obama's administration?
subtitle: The deaths of two undocumented migrant children detained by border patrol personnel in December 2018 led to rumours that many migrant children had died during the Obama Andbos era; this is a surveillance situation.
author: David Emery
vclaim: 18 undocumented migrant children died in custody of the United States Border Patrol during the Obama administration.
